Package index

Import & QA

read_weather_csv()
Read a raw weather CSV and standardize columns
normalize_weather_names()
Normalize weather data column names
default_weather_mapping()
Default column mapping for raw weather CSVs
validate_weather()
Validate a standardized weather table

Gaps & Imputation

complete_daily_calendar()
Complete the daily calendar per station and mark gaps
summarise_gaps()
Summarise gaps in daily weather records
impute_weather()
Impute missing weather values by station

Summaries & Seasonal Fits

summarise_rainfall_monthly()
Summarise Rainfall by Month
plot_rainfall()
Plot Daily Rainfall
fit_seasonal_temp()
Fit seasonal temperature curve
fit_seasonal_photo()
Fit seasonal photoperiod curve
sample_rainfall_by_month()
Sample daily rainfall by month
simulate_temp_shifts()
Simulate temperature shift scenarios from a fitted seasonal curve
simulate_rainfall_scenarios()
Simulate daily rainfall scenarios (monthly-seasonal sampling)

Photoperiod

daylength_f95()
Daylength (photoperiod) in hours (Forsythe et al. 1995)
photoperiod_year()
Photoperiod table for a given year and location/latitude
photoperiod_sites()
Built-in photoperiod sites

Shipped Data

weather_nl
Newfoundland daily weather example
